title: Ticket #4758: setting MAIL_FROM causes bad mail option
description:
HTCondor out going mail not correct if FROM_ADDRESS set in options files.

If one does a man mail on Red Hat 6 one notes -r and -f options exist. -r is for mail_from changes and -f is for from file. HTCondor current code master uses -f if mail_from specified and should use -r.
